org.fujion.highcharts

Class PlotSunburst

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.highcharts.PlotOptions
        • org.fujion.highcharts.PlotSunburst
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class PlotSunburst
extends PlotOptions
    Options for sunburst plot.

    A sunburst displays hierarchical data, where a level in the hierarchy is represented by a circle. The center represents the root node of the tree. The visualization bears a resemblance to both tree map and pie charts.

    • Field Detail

      • allowDrillToNode

        @Option
public Boolean allowDrillToNode
        When enabled the user can click on a point which is a parent and zoom in on its children. Defaults to false.

      • center

        @Option
public List<String> center
        The center of the sunburst chart relative to the plot area. Can be percentages or pixel values. Defaults to undefined.

      • levelIsConstant

        @Option
public Boolean levelIsConstant
        Used together with the levels and allowDrillToNode options. When set to false the first level visible when drilling is considered to be level one. Otherwise the level will be the same as the tree structure. Defaults to true.

      • levels

        @Option
public final List<LevelOptions> levels
        Set options on specific levels. Takes precedence over series options, but not point options.

      • levelSize_unit

        @Option(value="levelSize.unit")
public String levelSize_unit
        How to interpret levelSize.value. percentage gives a width relative to result of outer radius minus inner radius. pixels gives the ring a fixed width in pixels. weight takes the remaining width after percentage and pixels, and distributes it accross all "weighted" levels. The value relative to the sum of all weights determines the width. Defaults to weight.

      • levelSize_value

        @Option(value="levelSize.value")
public Double levelSize_value
        The value used for calculating the width of the ring. Its' affect is determined by levelSize.unit. Defaults to 1.

      • rootId

        @Option
public String rootId
        Which point to use as a root in the visualization. Defaults to undefined.

      • slicedOffset

        @Option
public Integer slicedOffset
        If a point is sliced, moved out from the center, how many pixels should it be moved?. Defaults to 10.

      • startAngle

        @Option
public Double startAngle
        The start angle of the pie slices in degrees where 0 is top and 90 right. Defaults to 0.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlotSunburst

        public PlotSunburst()
